bibl.title: Symposion Rules.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Brashear, William

bibl.note: Six lines of iambic trimeter, which seem to be a fragment of a new comedy (?) couched in Doric: someone prescribes the order of deities to be toasted at a symposion. Abusir el Melek, Augustan date. - P. 110: Hypothetical reconstruction by Colin Austin.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 107-111, 1 pl.
